channel.title: Blog on Kevin Pham
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Kevin Pham

item.title: Back to square one
item.description: For some astute followers (shoutout to Pigeon), you may have noticed the blog had changed in appearance. And yes, you are correct. The dilemma There was no issue using GatsbyJS, in fact, I think it is an enjoyable framework to use. The problem was, I was finding myself gradually becoming more distracted by what it had to offer. I was getting trapped and focused on looking at the shiny, instead of focusing more on what I wanted to do originally – start writing some content.

item.title: Putting the blog together
item.description: I enjoy reading. And as much as I wanted to write something, I never got around to it. With that said, this first post will dive straight into the thick of it. Thought Process I want to write content that I believe would help future me, and also inspire and help others. And so, I will share my current work-in-progress journey, one purposed to involve little time in maintaining. Have topics I want to share.
